game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where memories can be transferred from one person to another, the city of New Eden is plagued by a mysterious phenomenon known as 'The Forgetting'. As people's memories begin to fade away, the fabric of reality starts to unravel. Players take on the role of an amnesiac protagonist who discovers they have the ability to absorb and manipulate memories. Guided by a cryptic figure known only as 'The Architect', they embark on a perilous journey to uncover the truth behind The Forgetting and restore the city's memories before it's too late.
game.beginning: The game begins with the protagonist waking up in an abandoned hospital, with no recollection of who they are or how they got there. As they navigate the desolate streets of New Eden, they stumble upon a group of rebels fighting against the tyrannical government that seeks to control the last remaining memories.
game.ending: The ending is determined by the player's choices throughout the game. If they succeed in restoring the city's memories, they will be hailed as a hero and New Eden will begin to rebuild. However, if they fail, The Forgetting will consume everything, and the protagonist will be left alone with only their own fading memories.
